channel.title: Observer after dead shows as assasin
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was a observer and was killed in night. morning I was showed as assasin.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Show me as observer
#### Steps to reproduce: meybe they converted me but neutral killed me?
#### Comments:
